name: Museo ng Santa Rosa
description: The Museo ng Santa Rosa was the former city municipal town hall during the Spanish era. It was constructed in 1828, and it is a two-story building. In 2006, it became a Santa Rosa Museum that displays artifacts and furniture from the pre-Spanish era to World War II. However, the Covid-19 restriction will prevent from entering inside of the museum. Take a glance at its outside beauty.
commute: Ride a jeep with a sign "Bayan" or "Tagapo". The common fare rate is P10
address: F. Gomez St, Kanluran, Santa Rosa, 4026 Laguna
